vulnerability_details.description: App Check is explicitly disabled in Cloud Functions and Client initialization.
vulnerability_details.exploitation: Attacker can invoke Cloud Functions directly without using the web app, bypassing frontend restrictions.
vulnerability_details.impact: Abuse of API resources, potential data scraping or corruption.
vulnerability_details.affected_data: All user data accessed via Cloud Functions

steps: Set requireAppCheck to true in security-wrapper options
Uncomment App Check initialization in lib/firebase.ts
verification: Verify App Check token is required in requests

vulnerability_details.exploitation: DoS via crafted input if used in path expansion.

title: Insecure Randomness in jobs.ts

vulnerability_details.description: Math.random() used in security-sensitive context (storage path generation or similar).
vulnerability_details.exploitation: Predictable random numbers can lead to collisions or guessing of tokens/paths.

evidence: // SEC-REVIEW: Use cryptographically secure random bytes
